titles.title: Retirement Account Distribution Improvement Act of 2008
Retirement Account Distribution Improvement Act of 2008
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend the minimum required pension distribution rules for 2008, 2009, and 2010.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Retirement Account Distribution Improvement Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to suspend in 2008, 2009, and 2010 requirements for minimum distributions from tax-deferred retirement plans. Permits taxpayers who have already received a minimum distribution in 2008 to recontribute such distribution to their retirement plans by July 1, 2009.
